meanings.definition: Lack of a definite conclusion or resolution.
meanings.sent1: The inconclusiveness of the investigation left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The inconclusiveness of the experiment made it hard to determine the outcome.
meanings.sent3: The inconclusiveness of the magic trick added an element of mystery to the show.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held an air of inconclusiveness, leaving him wondering what she was thinking.
meanings.sent5: The inconclusiveness of the map led them in circles, unable to find their way out.

meanings.sent1: The inconclusiveness of the meeting left everyone uncertain about the next steps.
meanings.sent2: The inconclusiveness of the data made it challenging to make a decision.
meanings.sent3: The inconclusiveness of the weather forecast made planning the picnic a gamble.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a whirlwind of inconclusiveness, unable to settle on a single thought.
meanings.sent5: The inconclusiveness of her answer left him hanging, unsure of what to do next.
